channel.title: Welcome message problem
channel.description:
Hey i just added the alert command in my client so it pops up when somebody logs in. I already have added alertHandler.java and alert.java, everything compiles fine.
The problem is when i log in, i get "Alert##welcoem to lalala##have fun" in the chat screen and not as an alert in the part above...
any ides of what i should be missing here?

item.title: Welcome message problem
